title: remove dataset   of a dataset installed using released 0.4.1 resulted in some errorneous reporting

milestone.title: Release 0.6.0
milestone.description: A huge refactoring of input/output of API commands etc

body:
managed to replicate! ;) and seems to be the case only if installed dataset using released version (not sure why that should matter) and then remove  using current master 
```shell
$> datalad install -g -J4 ///labs/haxby/raiders
[INFO   ] Installing dataset at /home/yoh/raiders from http://datasets.datalad.org/labs/haxby/raiders 
[INFO   ] Getting 1 items of dataset <Dataset path=/home/yoh/raiders> ... 
[INFO   ] Actually getting 631 files 
Total (1 ok out of 631) 13%|█████████████████▍                                                                                                                    | 8.21G/63.2G [01:12<04:55, 186MB/s^Cligned/task002/BOLD/bold_hyper_sw1_mni_gray_large_part1_hyperaligned.hdf5.gz:  40%|██████████████████████████████▋                                              | 2.25G/5.64G [01:11<01:58, 28.7MB/s]
aligned/task002/BOLD/bold_surfslhyper_sw1_radius20_lr32_hr128_full_featsel0.7.hdf5.gz:  63%|███████████████████████████████████████████▏                         | 1.97G/3.14G [01:11<00:46, 25.5MB/s]
aligned/task002/BOLD/bold_hyper_sw1_mni_gray_large.hdf5.gz:  32%|██████████████████████████████▎                                                                 | 2.10G/6.66G [01:11<02:14, 33.9MB/s]
aligned/task002/BOLD/bold_surfslhyper_sw1_radius20_lr32_hr128_part2_featsel0.7.hdf5.gz:  37%|████████████████████████▊                                           | 1.16G/3.19G [00:41<01:16, 26.3MB/s]
ERROR: 
Interrupted by user while doing magic:  [cmd.py:_get_output_online:196]

*$> source $HOME/proj/datalad/datalad/venv-tests/bin/activate
```

@mih -- ideas?
